about_the_game:
Tank Warz! is an arcade shooter with a modern look and feel, featuring fast paced tank battles with enemies that wish to prevent you from fulfilling your mission.

Your mission is simple: Destroy the enemy Spawn Portals to stop the evil tank invasion whilst battling your way through different terrains and big bosses.

Featuring pickup items such as Health Packs and "Insta-Bombs" (dropped at random when an enemy tank is destroyed) to help (or sometime hinder!) you in your mission. Additionally featuring an energetic rock backing track and an old-school look, Tank Warz! will engross you in hours of arcade fun - can you beat your high-score?
detailed_description:
Tank Warz! is an arcade shooter with a modern look and feel, featuring fast paced tank battles with enemies that wish to prevent you from fulfilling your mission.

Your mission is simple: Destroy the enemy Spawn Portals to stop the evil tank invasion whilst battling your way through different terrains and big bosses.

Featuring pickup items such as Health Packs and "Insta-Bombs" (dropped at random when an enemy tank is destroyed) to help (or sometime hinder!) you in your mission. Additionally featuring an energetic rock backing track and an old-school look, Tank Warz! will engross you in hours of arcade fun - can you beat your high-score?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5670 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

name: Tank Warz! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tank Warz! is an arcade shooter game that will keep you entertained for... A little while. Featuring fast paced tank destruction, power-ups, traps, and an energetic rock soundtrack, you'll possibly enjoy hours of arcade fun.
